choices.name: Discoteque
choices.tip: Dance Club.  The Dance Club has lots of useful abilities and properties, which will be detailed here eventually!

choices.name: Back
choices.tip: Stand in the back row.  Attacks will hit players standing in front of you, but they'll collect falling treats too.  Good for building and activating.

choices.name: Mid
choices.tip: Stand in the middle row.  Average defense and collecting.  Good for healing and assisting.

choices.name: Forward
choices.tip: Stand in the front row.  Attacks and treats will hit you first.  Good for defending and extracting.

choices.name: Defend
choices.tip: Protect yourself and all players standing at the same building as you.  You will all take less damage.

choices.name: Heal
choices.tip: Heal other players next to you, as well as yourself.

choices.name: Extract
choices.tip: Extract resources from the building you're at.  What is extracted depends on the building type.

choices.name: Activate
choices.tip: Use special ability of building you're at.

choices.name: Item 1
choices.tip: This will be the first item that you collect over the course of the game.

choices.name: Item 2
choices.tip: This will be the second item that you collect over the course of the game.

choices.name: Item 3
choices.tip: This will be the third item that you collect over the course of the game.
